ConvLab

The multidomain end-to-end dialog development toolkit

ConvLab

ConvLab is an open-source multidomain end-to-end dialog system platform, that enables researchers to quickly set up experiments with reusable components and compare a large set of different approaches, ranging from conventional pipeline systems to endto-end neural models, in common environments.
